Coffee price surge: Dutch multinational reaps profits from NZ consumers https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/coffee-price-surge-dutch-multinational-reaps-profits-from-nz-consumers/R3IRM6HFTBC3PJZJRE4PHFV2RA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/coffee-price-surge-dutch-multinational-reaps-profits-from-nz-consumers/R3IRM6HFTBC3PJZJRE4PHFV2RA/ Duncan BridgemanWhy you're paying more for your latte and who's making the profit. Sun, 05 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Coffee and tea prices are on the increase due to supply challenges and growing demand from China. Meanwhile the local arm of Dutch tea and coffee firm JDE Peet's is making higher profits from NZ consumers. Photo / Getty Images
